title: So Riot released that Iron is going under Bronze in the new rank system.
body:
I disagree with this from a logical perspective. I think Stone should come before Bronze because just think about history for a second.

Stone age > Bronze age > Iron age

Iron is stronger and slightly more advanced than Bronze, so why should Iron be considered worse?

I know this is kind of insignificant but I think from a logical perspective it works out better for Stone to be below Bronze rather than Iron.
